column6:
The dark secret of the Illuminati. Marvel's most covert gathering of heroes has a secret so dark that they never speak of it, even to each other. And it could be what has brought about the Secret Invasion.,2008,8
From Secret Invasion author Brian Michael Bendis and Uncanny X-Men's Billy Tan.
Rated A ...$2.99
